summary: The bill, titled the "Transitioning Retiring And New Service Members to Port Ocean Rail and Truck Jobs Act" or "TRANSPORT Jobs Act," directs the Secretary of Transportation to create an action plan to help veterans and members of the Armed Forces eligible for preseparation counseling find employment in the supply chain sector. The plan will identify barriers to employment, challenges faced by employers, and industry trends, while also highlighting relevant skills and recommending specific actions for various government departments.
